Package angryflappybird

Class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
angryflappybird.AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer
Enclosing class:
AngryFlappyBird
class AngryFlappyBird.MyTimer extends javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
MyTimer extends the AnimationTimer class and is responsible for animating the game by creating a continuous loop that updates the game components as needed

      private void displayBackground()
      displayBackground handles switching the background from night mode to day periodically it utilizes a boolean value that checks what the background is set to if the background is set to night, it switches to day and vice versa if the background is set to day, it switches to night and vice versa

    • moveBlob

      private void moveBlob()
      moveBlob is responsible for animating the blob it has two main functions: 1. animate the blob when the start button is clicked 2. animate the blob when it is in autopilot mode

    • moveEggAndPig

      public void moveEggAndPig()
      moveEggAndPig is responsible for animating the eggs and pigs The eggs appear randomly on downard pipes through our randomizer algorithm The pig appears randomly on the screen dropping from a top pipe to a low pipe
